website_summaries.verdict: The Asus Chromebook C202SA-YS02 comes with a sturdy, kid-friendly, modular design and a low price that makes it a good choice for the classroom.
pros: Durable, modular design that makes it easy to repair or replace parts
cons: Can be a bit sluggish when browsing in multiple tabs

customer_reviews.title: Good value Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and stylish Chromebook, Seems robust and have had no issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: A. Callow

customer_reviews.title: Not water resistant as stated
customer_reviews.text: The laptop broke instantly as soon as it got a little rain on it. Returning to Amazon a nightmare. support very difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Load of rubbish unless you only want google
customer_reviews.text: This thing does nothing I want it to. I wanted to use it on my travels to download and edit videos from my video camera. It will not play anything from my camera and I cannot use windows moviemaker which I use everywhere else to edit anything anyway. This is only useful for google searches and you tube videos and had I known that it was so incompatible with any other systems I would never have gone anywhere near it. The dustmen will get an early Christmas present because I am throwing away this piece of garbage
customer_reviews.author: Colin S

customer_reviews.title: Everything as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Wish it could be used on AC current as well but guess it is not possible. Tech support from ASUS was confusing and slow.
customer_reviews.author: Lost in the UK

customer_reviews.title: Ok Laptop, program is the problem
customer_reviews.text: Robust piece of kit but the android program is terrible. Any Microsoft app just does not work well with it. Especially Word. Outlook is a pain to use and crashes regularly. The messing about using drive (Google continuously converting everything to sheets) and the device always having the cloud as it's default save just convinces me that I should have just gone with a Windows.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Faulty
customer_reviews.text: My chrome book worked for few months then all of a sudden it stopped working and wouldn’t switch on, I rang amazon and they sent out a replacement which worked for 1 day and stopped. Amazon were very helpful and issued a refund
customer_reviews.author: Bro

customer_reviews.title: bit flimsy, amazing for school wrk had em 2 yrs despite the flaws ive kept them going just about
customer_reviews.text: the keys of My chrome book are almost popping off , my children have had one each also and it did not survive my youngest son who is autisitc one button fell of so the rest had to go naturally to him as he likes no gaps , also chargers stopped working withing the first few months of having these have been alternating two out of three chargers and just hoping they do charge
customer_reviews.author: Blakestarmum

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I love this, if you just want to surf the internet, check your emails, use on google drive they are brilliant and cost effective
customer_reviews.author: Ozzy

customer_reviews.title: Great product great value
customer_reviews.text: I used this product and like very durable and fast, waterproof and idiot proof no downsides
customer_reviews.author: Calum

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and valuable.
customer_reviews.text: Is good, fast, and is cheap for what it is. The bad thing is that is not windows, so most things you can do with a Windows you can't do it. But if you are just into internet browsing is really fine.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Bicelis

customer_reviews.title: Struggles with external drivrs
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t work well with an external drive which I’d been using fine with windows. It seems fairly slow too, so sending back as I wanted something to download photos from camera and flick through them.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S. Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: First impressions are great. It's just perfect for me as I don't actually need it for anything to do with work, school or business. It's just nice for me to use it for things tjat are better to use on a laptop than a mobile phone.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney L Webb

customer_reviews.title: Its for WiFi only
customer_reviews.text: Got net page I needed. Won't take a dongle or DVD player...I got hacked with hotspot on and emails vanished out from inbox. I blame false advert hope for financial gain or Google control?
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this little unit. So well made and easy to use. Much better than tablets in my view, does every thing I want, Start up time is amazingly quick as well.
customer_reviews.author: GOSOUTH

customer_reviews.title: asus google  Chrome Book
customer_reviews.text: very happy with the Chrome book easy to use searches excellent very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Susan Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I only had this for around a year before I turned it off one night and it hasn’t switched on since. I’ve charged it, tried to reset it, and googled things I can try - to no avail. Very disappointed as it claims so many promises but I feel very let down. Won’t be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Chrombook for pupils
customer_reviews.text: Bought one last year for my kids, chrombook is fantastic , robust and kids use it alll time for their study. Bought another one last Black Friday. Highly recommend it for pupils in primary and high school.
customer_reviews.author: tawfik

customer_reviews.title: Who needs a Windows laptop?
customer_reviews.text: Perfect in almost all ways - printing is a pain, tho.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Lavin

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Item upon arrival didn’t charge or switch on. Hope the replacement works
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Its a great little machine
customer_reviews.text: I love it, its fast, my daughter-in-law loves it too , I might buy her one for christmas
customer_reviews.author: C Ritchie

customer_reviews.title: By a.
customer_reviews.text: Touch pad stopped working after 2 months had to send it back to seller now waiting for it to be repaired or replaced now over 3 weeks this was a christmas present for my granddaughter to help her with her homework
customer_reviews.author: IAN LINDLEY

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth Problem
customer_reviews.text: Everything run good, but the only problem is that no connection with Bluetooth to any device, and no sharing youtube videos with my smart TV. I try all ways, I have look at internet for fix this problem but nothing.
customer_reviews.author: GYUZEL HRISTOV

customer_reviews.title: Mousepad failure¬!!!!
customer_reviews.text: After only 18 months the mouse pad has failed and the cost of returning it for repair makes it uneconomic to send to back to Asus. Sad as this has served my son well at Uni
customer_reviews.author: David Veysey

customer_reviews.title: Very nice clean secondhand chrome book
customer_reviews.text: Very quickly delivered very happy with it looks like new no complaints at all
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Homework
customer_reviews.text: It was bought for homework, so my son could communicate with school whilst studying. We both are pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Fab
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money, my daughter finds it easy to use for school work, she’s six!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: Brought as a present but I have had very positive feedback.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Harris

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I dislike that it wouldn't work due to the screen being broken, I got the product 3 weeks before Christmas and that was when it got opened but it was too late to get my money back I assume
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised. Its an absolute good value for money. I love it. I had bought it to type my uni essays. I am so happy with it. I had read some reviews before buying and i am happy i did.
customer_reviews.author: Kay P

customer_reviews.title: Overstimated
customer_reviews.text: Very slow Does not fulfil the purpose bought for Looks like it is overstimulated
customer_reviews.author: mahfouzelsawi

customer_reviews.title: weird succes
customer_reviews.text: i bought this few days ago, i started using it yesterday. this morning i logged in and the system asked my for a password which i dont think i set it up.is it normal?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Kids
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant for my daughter as it works with Google Family Link
customer_reviews.author: Mr B.

customer_reviews.title: its robust and light
customer_reviews.text: and its really good. does have some lag but for the money is very good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for our son to use at school, and really tough to withstand being dropped
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Good laptop
customer_reviews.text: Good laptop at a reasonable price. Well designed and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Matthew McLuckie

customer_reviews.title: Great little device!!!
customer_reviews.text: Really great little device. Perfect for my college work. Very durable which is handy with 2 young children around. Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Pmayc88

customer_reviews.title: A nice little device Great for Linux dual boot
customer_reviews.text: I brought this back in January to put Linux on it for a small portable dual boot device. Its the first chrome book I have had and must say its great for the casual user however if you want it for anything other than browsing the web or watching videos/live streaming look for something else as it simply lacks the power and specs for much else. All in All well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: jake

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Very nice don't have much computer knowledge but on brief checkover quality is fab for price boots up exceptionally fast and is picture& video very good
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Nice google chrome book
customer_reviews.text: Nice google chrome book. It's fast boot up time. Take it anywhere. Had some problems with the first one. Had to go back. Amazon sent me another one in two days. Fab.
customer_reviews.author: peter

customer_reviews.title: Slow and unresponsive
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money, save a bit more and buy a proper laptop. This thing is slow, unresponsive and constantly crashes when loading or opening apps. I brought it to do some basic spreadsheet operations and start an online business but it's become more a hindrance rather than a help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Built like a Tank!
customer_reviews.text: As this is my first Chromebook, I am impressed by the performance so far. Feels tough and convenient to travel with. It's built like a tank, but does not run like one - it's a lot faster than I imagined it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop, very useful for tasks using basically internet, battery lasts a long time even watching videos.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana

customer_reviews.title: Great device from a crap company
customer_reviews.text: This is a really lovely Chromebook in every way but the dreadful customer service from ASUS leaves a lot to be desired! I have tried a dozen times to phone and email them to register my product but no one can be bothered to respond to me so I hope I do not need to return my product under warranty in the future. As for the device it is very well thought out,well made and pleasant to use and despite my problems with the manufacture I cannot really criticise this Chromebook at all,I just don't know how they could make something as good as this for the price.Overall I am very happy with this lovely little notebook!
customer_reviews.author: uglyblokeonabike

customer_reviews.title: Best buy for a while
customer_reviews.text: This is the best buy I have made since learning to use computers, I just wish I had known more when I started as would have saved a few hundred quid, very quick and easy to use,the only drawback was the lettering in lower case which was surprisingly inconvenient but easily remedied with large stick on letters, so if you buy this also get some large stickers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: just the right size to fit my rucksack for my work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Complaint
customer_reviews.text: Iam a bit disappointed in this product. I love chromebook don't get me wrong bt this current one has only lasted me less than 6 months. It was fine yesterday but when I went to turn it back on it won't turn on or charge by the look of it. I've very posses if because asx I said it's less than 9 months old and cost me quite a bit if money. I'm not having much luck trying to contact the seller so if they read this could they please get in contact as I am demanding either a refund or a fix at Little to no cost. This is totally unexceptable.
customer_reviews.author: jessica keen

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: my old notebook decided to work so the new one sat redundant at the moment
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne B.

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop , not sure about the consistency of screen though.
customer_reviews.text: First one had a memory issue so it was sent back . The replacement had a superior screen. It is much clearer and not as matt as the original one. The difference is quite pronounced. You would notice it even if they weren't side by side. Incidentally, this one had a loose ESC key so I hope the third one will have as nice a screen as the second one. I know companies source the same components by different suppliers, but I would expect any difference to be minor. The aforementioned screen clarity is significant. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Maximus

customer_reviews.title: Buy a windows one.
customer_reviews.text: Chrome OS is terrible, it's really the biggest flaw with this otherwise okay laptop, that and the tiny hard drive and the keyboard which is missing most of the useful keys like delete. I bought this laptop around 6 months ago for my partner, she and I found chrome such a headache I removed it and installed windows, this I then replaced in favour of Ubuntu because the hard drive wasn't large enough for windows to be usable, now I will be replacing the laptop for windows one with a decent size hard drive and avoiding chrome books like the plague they are.
customer_reviews.author: prunt23

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son. He uses it daily for studying and for consuming audio and video. He is not "into" technology. He is happy to use the Chrome OS (we were not a "Windows" house) and as a result he is very happy with this machine. The battery life is a day and the build quality is (currently) teenager-proof. This is not a high-end laptop but it is a portable and effective machine.
customer_reviews.author: Business Book Worm

customer_reviews.title: You can drop it and it still works
customer_reviews.text: This was not a deliberate experiment. Has become my constant companion. Video (and video out) works extremely well. You have to remember it is not a laptop and I did crash it a few times by having too many Chrome tabs open. I stick to 4 or 5 now, and works fine. Virtues like being easy to pick up don't sound very exciting, but are really nice in real life.
customer_reviews.author: shshsh

customer_reviews.title: good christmas present
customer_reviews.text: easy to set up but it helped having used google chrome before.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son. Great buy and very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Janine B.

customer_reviews.title: Better than I ever thought
customer_reviews.text: A better choice then I ever thought I am considering converting to chromebook instead of windows
customer_reviews.author: D b

customer_reviews.title: Great for what I need: but buyers beware, it is NOT a windows laptop!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fed up with windows bloat, I moved to Linux pc and android phones and tablets years ago. Thought I'd try a chromebook. You can run the chrome apps and most of the Google play store android apps. Goes great. It's got rubber corner protection so it will take a bit of workshop abuse. simple to setup. Cheap as chips. IT is not however a Windows laptop. Some bad reviews on here because it doesn't run MS Office. It can but it is better with Google's apps.
customer_reviews.author: Tup Ensworth

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant - never go back from chrome book!
customer_reviews.text: Love the chrome book - sturdy too which helps me as I am clumsy!
customer_reviews.author: Maddy

customer_reviews.title: Good Chromebook but more chunky than others
customer_reviews.text: Good Chromebook, got it as part of Prime Day for £100. Keys and build are sturdy, speed is ok, for occasional word processing, surfing or emails it is great. Screen is ok too, not as bad as some have said.
customer_reviews.author: Charles D.

customer_reviews.title: Useful for basic users.
customer_reviews.text: Have not had chromebook before but have tried Linux. Very, very easy to set up but needs time and concentration when adding unusual apps such as Apache OpenOffice writer. Not enough USB ports (only 2) so need new extensions on that too. I really only use laptop for internet and documents so Microsoft really was OTT for me.
customer_reviews.author: Miss S Mills

customer_reviews.title: I loved the C200, this is better!
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace a three year old C200, screen failed (probably pushed back too far). Better, tougher case which is easier to hold, screen folds right back this time and now with two USB and one HDMI ports. Had to update to current Chrome before able to use properly, problems with screen resolved when 'high contrast' mode was deleted. So a cheaper, tougher and more versatile version of a device I found to be really useful before and the modular approach for the internals will make it easier to fix if necessary,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: ASUS C202SA-GJ0027 11.6 Inch Notebook - (Dark Blue) (Intel Celeron N3060 Processor, 2 GB RAM, 16 GB eMMC, Chrome OS)
